author: costin
msg: Added a small experimental feature to Engine - hopefully that will
replace the 2 hacks we use to load the console and bridge between
standalone and embeded.
Engine will be able to load a conf/tomcat5-mbeans.xml file via
modeler (same syntax as in the ant file - except the property subst.
for now ).
I still need to get the persistence finished.

author: costin
msg: Fix some encodings - it uses the manifest format which requires \n to
be quoted and has a limit on the line size.
( again - the reason for using this format is relative simplicity -
which allows C and java code to generate and parse it easily and fast )

author: costin
msg: The /manager was broken for me, couldn't find the resource bundle. That
was because StringManager was in the server class loader, and the
resources inside the manager webapp - and ResourceBundle uses the
loader of the caller.
Now it will try the thread loader if the first one fails.

author: costin
msg: Get the domain from the context - it works better if the context
happen to be defined before the engine. ( i know it sounds
crazy - but in JMX world components can start and disapear
at any time )
